mapper.sql: usertag_id, user_id, tag_type, create_time, create_userid, create_username, update_time, update_userid, update_username
mapper.select: select count(1) from tab_pb_user_tag where user_id = #{userId} and tag_type = #{tagType}

SELECT t.usertag_id,if(usertag_id is not null,1,0) as tag_type,t.user_id,id, parent_id, value, label, type, description, sort, remarks from (SELECT * FROM sys_dict WHERE parent_id = 59381 and del_flag = 0 and remarks = '1') d left join tab_pb_user_tag t on d.id = t.tag_type and t.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY d.sort
mapper.delete: delete from tab_pb_user_tag where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and tag_type = #{tagType,jdbcType=BIGINT}

user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
tag_type = #{tagType,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_userid = #{createUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT},

update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_userid = #{updateUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_username = #{updateUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where usertag_id = #{usertagId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tab_pb_user_tag set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, tag_type = #{tagType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_userid = #{createUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_username = #{createUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_userid = #{updateUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_username = #{updateUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where usertag_id = #{usertagId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
